template <dimension_type D, typename Scalar>
class vsip::impl::Scalar_block_base
File: ../../../vsip/core/expr/scalar_block.hpp

An adapter presenting a scalar as a block. This is useful when constructing binary expression blocks (which expect two block operands) taking a block and a scalar.

Template parameters:
D:to be a dimension with range 0 < D <= VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION
Scalar:to be a builtin scalar type.
